name: mysqli_fetch_lengths
purpose: Returns the lengths of the columns of the current row in the result set

return.description:
An array of integers representing the size of each column (not including
   any terminating null characters). FALSE if an error occurred.mysqli_fetch_lengths is valid only for the current
   row of the result set. It returns FALSE if you call it before calling
   mysqli_fetch_row/array/object or after retrieving all rows in the result.
